Train Wreck was hit by everything! And I mean absolutely everything fired a=
t him. The electric blasts and lasers didn't do too much damage, but the mi=
ssiles and the optic blasts helped to create his new piercing on his arm. H=
e poked at a hole on his arm and looked at all of the enemies around him. Y=
es, this was a very good way to go insane, getting hit by all of these shot=
s and not being able to decide who to fire at. Deemos flies straight up int=
o the air to avoid the shots fired by Speed Viper. None of the Radicons cou=
ld fly, and he wasn't sure if any of the Mafia besides himself could.

Deem=
os: It's strange how fate is twisted around like this.

Deemos drew his lar=
ge machete.

Deemos: I'm going to gut you...

r says as he fires 8 semi-automatic

     "Die Dishwa=
sher!"  Electronet yells at Train wreck as he fires 4 electric

 4 optics at him.

     Apewing fires 1 missle at Train wreck and 1 missle =
at Aerotaur.

     Speed Viper then decides to run after Hot Rod.  He uses =
his tremendous

ired 25 Rapid fire 
  lasers at Train wreck as he ran by.
